subject: 男主角在山巅修炼，满头大汗，但眼神坚定
detail: 2D Chinese anime style, a determined young male protagonist meditating cross-legged on the peak of Lingjian Mountain, sweat glistening on his forehead and face, his eyes sharp and resolute; first the glowing spiritual energy illuminates his forehead, then expands to highlight the swirling qi vortex around his body, finally radiating outward to illuminate the vast sea of clouds below; ethereal spiritual energy swirls dynamically around him, soft volumetric lighting with gentle atmospheric glow, mist drifting through the clouds, high-resolution 8K cinematic detail; fixed camera framing, centered composition; background sound: howling mountain wind and subtle shimmering spiritual energy pulses. Voiceover says in Chinese "他踏上修行之路，只为寻找真相。"
image_detail: (2D国漫风格)，灵剑山巅，男主角盘腿打坐，周围环绕灵气，背景是云海，高清晰度，8K画质
narration: 他踏上修行之路，只为寻找真相。
